titles.title: A resolution honoring the leadership and celebrating the retirement of Edwin Walker, the Deputy Assistant Secretary for Aging for the Administration for Community Living.
A resolution honoring the leadership and celebrating the retirement of Edwin Walker, the Deputy Assistant Secretary for Aging for the Administration for Community Living.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution honors the leadership of Edwin Walker, the Deputy Assistant Secretary for Aging for the Administration for Community Living, and celebrates his retirement.
